short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a Prescribe button that links to ScriptPad from your Nookal account

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a Prescribe button to the Nookal patient profile which links to ScriptPad for easy prescribing to the patient.
